base_app.summary: Collaborative vibe-coding dashboard for non-technical founders to describe app behavior in natural language and see it materialize in real time.

features.title: Project Creation Wizard
features.description: Onboard new projects with an intuitive wizard that includes document upload capabilities.

features.title: Feature Proposal & Approval
features.description: Allow users to propose new features and manage an approval workflow, with email and in-app notifications for decisions.

features.title: NLP Command Console
features.description: Enable users to describe app behavior using natural language commands within each project, facilitating real-time materialized changes.

features.title: Task Queue Visualization
features.description: Provide a clear view of tasks with statuses like pending, running, blocked, and done.

features.title: Activity Log with Filtering
features.description: Maintain a detailed log of project activities, including proposals, tasks, and approvals, with filtering options.

tasks.title: Implement: Implement feature "Project Creation Wizard" described as: On
tasks.description:
Implement feature "Project Creation Wizard" described as: Onboard new projects with an intuitive wizard that includes document upload capabilities..
Additional instructions:
Build the base vibe-coding application scaffolding according to the uploaded specification.
Summary: Collaborative vibe-coding dashboard for non-technical founders to describe app behavior in natural language and see it materialize in real time.
Architecture: Frontend: Vite + React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui, Backend: Supabase functions, Realtime: Supabase channels, Auth: Magic-link email, Hosting: Vercel (frontend), Supabase (backend)
Tech Stack: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Supabase
Key Routes: /login, /dashboard, /projects/:id, /projects/:id/spec, /projects/:id/proposals, /projects/:id/activity-log

payload.summary: This project event, identified as `document_split` within `demo-project`, involved the processing of 5 features.
